ARABIC: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْتَكْبِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is no doubt that Allah knows what they keep secret and what they make public. He does not love people puffed up with pride.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely God knows what they hide and what they disclose. He certainly does not love the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely Allah knows all that they conceal and all that they disclose. He certainly does not love those who are steeped in arrogance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God certainly knows whatever you conceal or reveal. He does not love the proud ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Certainly Allah knows what they hide and what they disclose; indeed He does not like the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Certainly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal. Truly, He does not like the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Truly Allah knows what they hide and what they manifest; surely He does not love the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Without a doubt God knows what they keep secret and what they publish; He loves not those that wax proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Assuredly Allah knoweth that which they keep hidden and that which they proclaim. Lo! He loveth not the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God surely knows what they conceal and what they reveal. He does not love the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Undoubtedly Allah knoweth that which they keep secret and that which they publish; verily He loveth not the stiff- necked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Undoubtedly, Allah knows whatever they hide and whatever they disclose. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Undoubtedly Allah doth know what they conceal, and what they reveal: verily He loveth not the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Certainly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal. Truly, He likes not the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah knows without doubt what they hide and what they make known. He does not love the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Without a doubt, God knows what they conceal and what they reveal. He does not like the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:23] Without doubt, verily, God knows what they keep secret and what they disclose, and will requite them for it. Indeed He does not love the arrogant, meaning, He will punish them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Assuredly Allah knoweth that which they keep hidden) of hatred, resentful envy, plotting and treachery (and that which they proclaim) of vilification, slander and violent confrontation. (Lo! He loveth not the proud) those who are too proud to believe.
